entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 8.
